title: aff
body: i have 6 hextech chest but i havent keys

replies.body:
The key fragment droprate is more of a curve rather than a line. This means that with every key fragment you earn, the chances of the next drop gets exponentially lower. You can find complete details on the Hextech system in our [Hextech Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
